altername_name: A Little Bit of... All Time Classics: Card Classics
name: Clubhouse Games Express: Card Classics
overview: Choose one of five familiar card games and prove your skills against the system or a group of your friends! Clubhouse Games comes to DSiWare with a collection of five fun card games in Clubhouse Games Express: Card Classics. Play familiar favorites like Blackjack and Five Card Draw or test your ability in the fast-paced Last Card, Last Card Plus, and President. DS Download Play allows players to host as many as seven friends.
